means: 耸肩（以表示冷淡，怀疑等）

sentence.Network_en: Mme Arlette gave a Gallic shrug.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿莱特女士做了一个法国式的耸肩动作。

means.word_mean: 颤抖,摇动,震动,痉挛,激动

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'fidget'): of unknown origin

entry.tran: 耸肩(表示不感兴趣、不知道或不在乎)
entry.def: If you shrug, you raise your shoulders to show that you are not interested in something or that you do not know or care about something.

example.ex: I shrugged, as if to say, 'Why not?'...
example.tran: 我耸了耸肩，仿佛在说，“为什么不?”

means.word_mean: 1. raise one's shoulders to indicate indifference or resignation

means.word_mean: 耸肩(以表示冷淡, 怀疑等)

sentences.en: He shrug his low opinion of the occupant of the room.
sentences.cn: 他耸耸肩表示对那房间的住户不屑一顾。

jushi.english: People only shrugged at his protests.
jushi.chinese: 人们对他的抗议只是耸耸肩。

jushi.english: She shrugged her shoulders and made no reply.
